title: My friend is trying to tell me pokemon sucks now because Megas make no sense
body:
Because pokemon made _sooooo_ much sense before.
We have living zap magnet balls that float just because, and piles of goop and trash. Not to mention the "evolutionary chains that make logical, scientific sense" he keeps mentioning that include things like bagon the chibi T-rex cocooning into a turtle monster and sprouting out into a beautiful lizard butterfly.
But mega evolutions are where it went too far. Ok. Alright. 

And I absolutely cannot talk him down from this.
